DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare conventional laryngoscopy with video-stylet (Trachway) for nasotracheal intubation in patients undergoing oro-maxillo-facial surgery.
DOC.criteria: 1. patients with American Society of Anesthesiologists physical status IIII 2. aged 2065 years 3. Requiring Nasotracheal Intubation under general anesthesia 4. unlimited mouth open 5. unlimited neck motion 1. mouth open ＜ 3 cm 2. Ankylosing arthritis patients. 3. BMI≧35 kg/m2
